invite.title: Invite Friends
invite.scanQRCode: Scan QR code to share with friends
invite.ruleDescription: When you invite friends to register and purchase membership, ##both parties## will receive extra membership duration rewards.
invite.retailerRuleDescription: When you invite friends to register and purchase membership, ##the invitee## will receive extra membership duration rewards.
invite.loadInviteCodeFailed: Failed to load invite code, please try again
invite.generateInviteCodeFailedRetry: Failed to generate invite code, please try again
invite.copyFailedPermission: Copy failed, please check clipboard permissions
invite.updateRemarkFailedRetry: Failed to update remark, please try again
invite.clickToCopyInviteContent: Click the area above to copy the complete invite content, including download link, invite code, and reward description
invite.inviteCodeDescription1: Each user can generate multiple invite codes, invite codes are valid permanently
invite.inviteCodeDescription2: Each invitee can only be invited once
invite.loadFailed: Failed to load invite code info, please try again.
invite.getInviteCodesFailed: Failed to get invite code list
invite.retry: Failed to get invite code list, please try again
invite.retailerCashbackExample: Example: User pays {{orderAmount}}, you get {{cashback}} cashback
invite.firstOrderOnlyDesc: You get cashback when user makes first payment
invite.allOrdersDesc: You get cashback for every user payment
invite.retailerCashbackTip: Cashback will automatically go to your wallet and can be withdrawn anytime to your payment address
invite.generateNewCodeTip: Track distribution channels with different invite codes
invite.expirationSecurityHint: Short-term share links are safer in chats, automatically expire to protect your privacy
